Package it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Broker
    The Broker of the server, it is the publisher of the event messages to send to the clients
    ClientHandler
    Reads the commands from the client and sends them to the server for manipulation closes right after it's done
    GamesManager
    Singleton.
    GamesTimer
    The big timer of the timer.
    MessageInterpreter
    It is the object that computes the Request Messages of the client and generates the correct Response Message calling the appropriate methods of the OmniView
    RMIStarter
    The RMI side of the server, it publishes on the registry the remote interface for the rmi client to use.
    Server
    The main class of the server, it creates two separate "subservers" one for RMI communication and one for sockets only communication
    SocketServer
    The thread of the server which handles the socket communication.
    SubscriberHandler
    Thread that is created from the broker to send event messages to the client communicating over Sockets
